alert.note: Alert for Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 11 at 10:49PM CDT until April 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Upper Gila Valley of New Mexico and Southern Hudspeth County in Texas. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur Tuesday afternoon. Blowing dust is possible, especially for Hudspeth County.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
